name: Music Composer
overview: Are you tone deaf? Do people cringe when you sing or play an instrument? You have just purchased your salvation. Welcome to the wonderful world of electronic music. Absolutely no musical ability or computer background is required to play this cartridge. This game will guide you step by step through the various methods of music making available in the Music Composer. The program will let you change instruments, change octaves and types of notes all to help you craft the latest masterpiece and listen to your new song and share them with your friends.
